name: Dungeon Game (abtintabrizi)
description:
An early version of a personal project. Not everything has been fully implemented yet.

What is currently implemented?

  • Player controls (WASD + Space to move, left click to shoot (no visual), right click to melee)
  • Main menu
  • A basic enemy type
  • Procedural level generation
  • Basic enemy pathfinding and AI
  • Temporary art and lighting

What isn't working yet?

  • Settings menu
  • Boss battles
  • Some bugs

What's being worked on?

  • Better menus
  • Bosses
  • More level types
  • Sound
  • Item drops

What's planned?

  • UI for enemies
  • Better enemy pathfinding
  • An upgrade system for each run
  • Music
  • A full settings menu implementation
  • A complete art rework (all assets are currently free assets off the unity store)
